overview: This Blu-ray shows you detailed and true-to-scale replicas of the treasures of the Pharaoh's tomb just as Howard Carter had originally discovered them.  Now, more than 3,000 years later, you can see the tomb of the Pharaoh, immense treasures and ancient mysteries in a sensational reconstruction in stereoscopic 3D.
tagline: This Blu-ray shows you detailed and true-to-scale replicas of the treasures of the Pharaoh's tomb just as Howard Carter had originally discovered them.
title: The Discovery of King Tut
